overview:
As Managing Director for mopay Inc. in the U.S., Kolja Reiss is responsible for overseeing all aspects of corporate relations and operations for mopay in North America. Kolja has over 16 years of experience in the telecommunications industry is now focusing entirely on providing best-in-class mobile micropayment solutions to blue-chip clients worldwide.

Previously as Director of Client Operations, he headed the technical operations for MindMatics USA in New York and Los Angeles, helping to establish MindMatics LLC as the market leader in the interactive television industry. Prior to Koljaâ€™s move to the U.S., he founded a computer and telecommunications retail company and successfully sold it after five years.

Kolja holds a Master’s Degree in Business Information Systems from the University of Paderborn in Germany. He is married and speaks English and German fluently.
